verses.roman:
prabhu-pāche bule ācārya kariyā huṅkāra
'hari-bola' 'hari-bola' bale bāra bāra

synonyms: prabhu-pāche—behind the Lord; bule—was walking; ācārya—Advaita Ācārya; kariyā—making; huṅkāra—a loud vibration; hari-bola hari-bola—chant the holy name of Hari; bale—says; bāra bāra—again and again.
translation: Advaita Ācārya would walk behind the Lord and loudly chant "Hari bol! Hari bol!" again and again.
